name: VERY LITTLE NIGHTMARES
summary:
Game overview
Very Little Nightmares is a mobile puzzle adventure game where the user takes the control of The Girl in The Yellow Raincoat during her spiraling escape from an odd mansion.

Be smart, resourceful and ready for anything while exploring every nook and cranny of the place, for even the smallest error can lead to a fatal misstep.

Key features
Little Nightmares comes to mobile with an original story in the form of a puzzle adventure game
Discover more about the backstory of The Girl in The Yellow Raincoat
Explore the Nest, a vast palace filled with life-threatening traps
Outwit enemies that awaits in every corner of this mansion
